section.title: Adding the Feedback System to WebHelp Responsive Documentation

ul.li: You must have an installed version of Oxygen XML Editor or Oxygen XML Author with a valid license.
To install and manage , you need to obtain a license for the product. For details, go to: .

If this is your first time using , you need to sign up for a Feedback account from the administration login page (). To do this, you can click on Log in with Google or Log in with Facebook to create an account using your Google or Facebook credentials, or click the Sign Up tab to create an account using your name and email address.

ol.li: Log in to your Feedback account from the administration login page ().
Click the Add site button to create a site (a Feedback configuration).
In the Settings page, enter a Name and Description for the site configuration. There are some optional settings that can be adjusted according to your needs. For more details, see the topic.

In the Initial version page, enter the Base URL for your website (you can add additional URLs by clicking the Add button). You can also specify an Initial version if you want it to be something other than 1.0. If you do not plan to have multiple versions, leave the version as 1.0. For more details, see the topic.

In the Installation page, choose a site generation option:
If you will generate the documentation using a transformation scenario in Oxygen XML Editor/Author, select the Oxygen XML Editor option and follow the on-screen instructions.
If you will generate the documentation using a command-line script, select the Oxygen XML WebHelp option and follow the on-screen instructions.
